slow_internet.solution: Try restarting your router and checking your connection settings.

app_crashing.symptom: The app keeps crashing on startup.
app_crashing.solution: Update the app to the latest version and restart your device.

email_not_working.symptom: Emails are not sending or receiving.
email_not_working.solution: Verify email server settings and check your internet connection.

printer_not_responding.solution: Check printer connections, restart the printer, and reinstall drivers if necessary.
